item.title: ‘A Banquet for Hungry Ghosts,’ ‘Taiwan Travelogue’ Among TCCF Pitching 2025 Selections as Literary Adaptations, International Co-Productions Drive Content Market
item.description: Taiwan Creative Content Fest has revealed its 2025 TCCF Pitching lineup, showcasing a strong emphasis on literary adaptations and cross-border collaborations that reflect the entertainment industry&#8
